scripts.easy_setup: sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:drop --env test || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all && sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.setup_db_create_seed: sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.setup_test_db_create_seed: sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test && sequelize db:seed:all --env test
scripts.test_server: export PORT=8000 && export NODE_ENV='test' && nodemon server/controllers/app.js
scripts.dev_server: export PORT=3000 && export NODE_ENV='development' && nodemon server/controllers/app.js
